comments:

I am unable to reproduce this. Can you give any more information about the 
system state at the time or anything else you may have done (e.g. refreshed 
the sync view, did a search, etc).

I got the same error again this morning.
I had not done any searches.  The sync view was not open.  I was in the PDE 
perspective.
I was doing a Replace with..Latest from repository at the project level when I 
got the error.

This looks like a problem in the JFace text component. Resigning to Platform 
Text.
